ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ), text( SBU__c ) = "D&S", Win_Only_Opportunity__c == false , not ISBLANK(text( Win_Probability__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Win Probability must be blank except for Win Only opportunities.
